SEARCH

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
Enquiry
Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Enquiry
The Suggestion class represents the suggesiton sent between staff and camp committee. The Suggestion will be specific to each camp. The student can submit the suggestion, view their suggestion, delete their suggestion. The staff can view all suggestions submitted by camp committee that oversee the camp the staff has created, and staff can make a reply to the camp committee's suggestion by accepting or rejecting the suggestion, and submitting the reply message.

    • Suggestion

      public Suggestion(int ID, String stringValue, String submittedBy, Date submittedOn, Date updatedOn, int campID)
      Constructor for the Suggestion object (new empty Suggestion)
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the suggestion
      stringValue - The String message of the suggestion
      submittedBy - The userID of the user submitting the suggestion
      submittedOn - The Date of the suggestion submission
      updatedOn - The Date of the last suggestion update
      campID - The ID of the camp this suggestion is sent to

    • Suggestion

      public Suggestion(int ID, String stringValue, String submittedBy, Date submittedOn, String reply, String repliedBy, Date repliedOn, Date updatedOn, int campID, int approvalStatus)
      Constructor for the Suggestion object (from database)
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the suggestion
      stringValue - The String message of the suggestion
      submittedBy - The userID of the user submitting the suggestion
      submittedOn - The Date of the suggestion submission
      reply - The reply message
      repliedBy - The camp committee's userID that made a reply
      repliedOn - The Date the reply was made
      updatedOn - The Date of the last suggestion update
      campID - The ID of the camp this suggestion is sent to
      approvalStatus - The status of the suggesiton
